answers.answer: I get that too sometimes i believe its also a sign of dehidration make sure you drink things other then water pass that gaterade lol. If it continues i would bring it up with your doctor good luck

Shouldn't be dehydrated but I'm going to try increasing how much water and Gatorade I drink and if it don't go away mention it to doctor. It isn't bothering me just really weird seeing the bubbles lol.

question: Has anyone ever had bubbles in their urine? It's weird every time I go to bathroom today there is bubbles in my pee. I've never seen this before and I looked online and it says it's a sign of preeclampsia but I've been checked for that and nothing plus my BP is always perfect.
title: urine bubbles?
